title: Arseniy Yatsenyuk: Russian idea to give terrorists the status of deputies of local councils will ...
text: ( Source : Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine ) A separate law must be adopted in order to hold elections in Donbas . 'But there are very strict conditions' for the holding of these elections, Prime Minister of Ukraine ArseniyYatsenyukstated in
